subject: Documentary Films and Programs
Olympic Games (2008)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Bud Greenspan, despite battling Parkinson’s disease, is looking toward the Beijing Summer Games next year to create another documentary that chronicles the inspiring side of the Olympics.
snippet: Bud Greenspan, despite battling Parkinson’s disease, is looking toward the Beijing Summer Games next year to create another documentary that chronicles the inspiring side of the Olympics.
